post.text:
As a candidate, Trump has already embarrassed us on the world stage.

Imagine the damage he'd do as president.

comment.author: Samantha
comment.text: Are you kidding me Hillary? You let pure bread Americans die in bengazi! And your biggest fear is trump !?!?!? We need a wall. We need to keep these snub bag terrorist out! You need to get on the other side of the wall

replies.author: Jacob
replies.text: what kind of bread? whole wheat? I'm sure you don't mean raisin....
